PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-01582012-03-01,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActCanada Pension Plan Investment Board Act
PrecisReappointment of ROBERT M. ASTLEY of Waterloo, Ontario, as a director of the board of directors of the Canada Pension Plan Investment Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a period ending October 26, 2014; and designation of ROBERT M. ASTLEY as Chairperson of the board of directors of the Canada Pension Plan Investment Board to hold office during good behaviour.
AttachmentsAttachment

ASTLEY as Chairperson of the board of directors of the Canada Pension Plan Investment Board to hold office during good behaviour.
